content: hanging out on a limb by jen cobb child to small adult sized leg warmers short /long swish worsted short 2 balls /long 3 skeins 1 set double pointed needles us size 6 1 stitch marker to keep track of your rounds gauge 5 5 stitches per inch in stockinette don t stress too much about gauge as there is plenty of stretch to cover slight gauge variances child length for short is 12-13 approx length for long is 16-17 approx width will stretch 10-12 inches out on a limb cast on 48 16 on each needle join into the round and work k2 p2 for 81 112 rounds cast off make two - long on my 5 5 teenager long on my 4 6 9 year old pattern copyright © jennifer m cobb the pattern is for unlimited personal use do not reproduce or sell the pattern for any questions please contact jen at cobbcabincrafts@yahoo com
